listener

Class SelectFilesListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • listener.SelectFilesListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SelectFilesListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class is to act as the listener for the menu item "File to Select Files" usage: fileSelectFilesItem.addActionListener(frame, eiaTable, esaTable)

      • SelectFilesListener

        public SelectFilesListener()

      • SelectFilesListener

        public SelectFilesListener(javax.swing.JLabel wkLabel,
                           EIATable iniEiaTable,
                           java.util.ArrayList<ESATable> iniEsaTables,
                           java.util.ArrayList<EDFFileHeader> iniEdfFileHeaders,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> srcEdfFiles)
        Initialize a SelectFilesListener
        Parameters:
        wkLabel - status label in the main frame
        iniEiaTable - the initial EIA table built from source files
        iniEsaTables - the initial group of ESA tables built from source files
        iniEdfFileHeaders - the initial EDF Headers acquired from source files
        srcEdfFiles - the path names of source files

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        See Also:
        algorithm: (1) first, select files through JFileChooser (2) build an array of EIA headers and ESA headers; (3) build a EIATable and multiple ESATables (each one of which corresponds to a file's signal attributes. (4) render all tables
